ca.concordia.app.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • ca.concordia.app.model.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Class Player which does Attack Reinforcement and Fortification. It will the Observable as it will notify based on the atate of the player
    Author:
    harvi
